```{r}
library(bio3d)
msa <- read.fasta("muscle-I20240530-230936-0002-29378947-p1m.fa")
sim_matrix <- seqidentity(msa)
library(pheatmap)

```


```{r}
pheatmap(sim_matrix, cluster_rows = TRUE, cluster_cols = TRUE, 
         display_numbers = FALSE, number_format = "%.2f")
```


```{r}

# Step 3: Search the PDB for similar structures using the first sequence in the MSA
blast_results <- blast.pdb(msa)

# Step 4: Analyze and visualize the results
# View the top 10 hits
head(blast_results, 3)
```
